name: I Need a Raft - Prototype
description:
I Need a Raft is a prototype and concept game. I wanted to try and create a game where I had to create my own character, learn more about shader graphs, and use a tilt-shift style camera (like links awakening for Nintendo Switch).

To Play 

- Main Island: Left right up down or WASD for movement and then spacebar for interactions
- 2nd level, WASD for movement.
